title: Animelo Summer Live 2024 -Stargazer- 8/31
overview: The world's largest anime song event, "Animelo Summer Live 2024 - Stargazer -," is now available as Blu-ray, featuring live performances from each event day. DAY2: Features the performances from 8/31. Artists: Aimi / Miku Ito / Maaya Uchida / Miho Okasaki / Yui Ogura / Kanoerana / GRANRODEO / Konomi Suzuki / Yu Serizawa feat. MOTSU / Taiyo To Odore Tsukiyo Ni Utae / Junichi Toki / TrySail / Hasuno Sora Jogakuin School Idol Club / Saori Hayami / Saori Hayami feat. HoneyWorks / Aya Hirano / Fragaria Memories / MyGO!!!!! / MASOCHISTIC ONO BAND.
